name: FLAVOR_CORE_COLLISION
prompt_base: Energetic suspension with elegant chaos, mid-air stillness captured at the moment of impact; 4:1 lighting ratio with bright overhead light and soft back fill, creating dynamic texture and clarity in the splash form. Advertisement energy meets product purity. Mid-air product environment — the cup floats above ground against a soft bamboo-beige gradient background with subtle Japanese washi texture. No table or ground is visible. Surrounding air is clean, with light vapor trails emphasizing motion and freshness. (No model — replaced by liquid behavior.) Transparent plastic matcha latte cup tilts 45° while floating in mid-air. From the upper-left, creamy milk pours into the drink, captured at the moment it crashes and splashes outward in a crown-shaped burst. Ice cubes are ejected mid-splash, spinning freely. 1 hero item (floating iced matcha latte cup, tilted diagonally, splash rising from impact point) 2 supporting pieces (hovering bamboo whisk near base, spiraling matcha leaf fragments caught in the air) — arranged with dynamic motion around the splash arc. Three semi-transparent ice cubes with motion trails; bamboo whisk floating near bottom-left; tiny suspended matcha powder particles; soft vapor rings enhancing spatial depth. Shape: Tall transparent cup with slight taper, angled mid-air. Material: PET plastic cup with clear layering of bright green matcha, milk, and visible ice. Key Feature: Milk splash forms elegant, curved crown structure suspended mid-air, with droplets trailing behind.
negative_prompt: No hands, no floor or table, no dirty splash, no low-quality textures, no surreal liquids, no flat backgrounds, no pastel filters, no cluttered elements.
